snippet.title: Amygdala Steam Launch Trailer - Get Lost
snippet.description:
When a man has his body stolen he typically has one of two reactions; he either dies, or he sets out on an adventure as a disembodied head, hell-bent on revenge. Amygdala is an action/adventure platformer where every living world you explore is a freshly generated permadeath challenge.

Find out more about Amygdala at:
http://amygdala.machinespirit.net

Get it on Steam at:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/369060
